Adverse Events Summary Table Teal Module

tm_t_ae_oview.Rd

Display AET01 Adverse Events Summary Table as a shiny Module

tm_t_ae_oview(label, dataname, arm_var, arm_var_choices,
  total_col = TRUE, pre_output = NULL, post_output = NULL,
  code_data_processing = NULL)

Arguments

label

menu item label of the module in the teal app
dataname

analysis data used in teal module, needs to be available in the list passed to the data argument of init.
arm_var

single name of variable in analysis data that is used as col_by argument for the respective tern or osprey function.
arm_var_choices

vector with variable names that can be used as arm_var
total_col

argument for appearance of "All Patients" column (default is TRUE)
pre_output

optional, shiny.tag with text placed before the output to put the output into context. For example the helpText elements are useful.
post_output

optional, shiny.tag with text placed before the output to put the output into context. For example the helpText elements are useful.

Value

an module object

Examples



# NOT RUN {
#Example using stream (adam) dataset 
library(dplyr)

data("rADSL")
data("rADAE")

ASL <- rADSL
AAE <- rADAE

x1 <- teal::init(
  data = list(ASL = ASL, AAE = AAE),
  modules = root_modules(
    tm_t_ae_oview(
       label = "AE Overview Summary Table",
       dataname = "AAE",
       arm_var = "ARM",
       arm_var_choices = c("ARM", "ARMCD"),
       total_col = FALSE
   )
  )
)

shinyApp(x1$ui, x1$server)

# }
